text: Amara prabhu! Ami niscaya'i amara bansadharadera katakake basabasa karalama tomara pabitra grhera nikate casa-basahina upatyakaya, -- amadera prabhu! Yena tara namaya kayema kare, sejan'ye kichu lokera mana tadera prati anuragi baniye da'o, ara tadera phalaphasala diye jibika pradana karo, yena tara krtajnata prakasa kare.
